narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this first pre-license inspection for a class "A" license. 
License fee can be sent to the following address:
USDA-APHIS-AC
2150 Centre Ave.
Building B, Mail Stop #3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
Conducting regulated activity without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
 Inspection and exit interview conducted with Kelly Maxwell, ACI and the facility representative.
